summary: An extremely simple plugin that allows the player to equip and un-equip the vanilla Arm and Head bandage clothing items.
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=#efefef]A quick, simple and easy plugin that allows the player to equip & un-equip the vanilla Arm and Head bandage items that by default are set as 'unplayable'.
[/color][/i]
[b]

I[size=4]nstallation[/size]

[/b][color=#efefef]Install via Mod organizer, Nexus Mod Manager or manually. (.7zip file contains a single .esp
 contained within the Data folder; cut the Data folder into your Skyrim directory!)
[/color]
[b][size=4]Where are the bandages?

[/size][/b][color=#efefef]You'll need to add them to your inventory via a simple console command. 

[/color][list]
[*][color=#efefef]Open the console (~) and type: player.additem 0004F006 1 to get your hands on a nice pair of [i]Arm bandages[/i]![/color]
[/list][color=#efefef]
[/color][list]
[*][color=#efefef]Open the console (~) and type: player.additem 0004F000 1 to wrap your head around the possibility of owning a nice blood soaked [i]Head bandage[/i]![/color]
[/list]

[b][size=4]Something wrong?

[/size][/b][color=#d8d8d8]Well, don't just sit there; let me know if I stuffed anything up. (which would be rather embarrassing; considering the tiny scope of the mod) Let me know if you'd like me to add the bandages to the world somewhere/would like an armoured version. Cheers!
[/color]
[size=4]Credit:
[/size]
[color=#666666][size=2]All Credit goes to Bethesda Game Studios - as only vanilla assets were used in the creation of this plugin. [/size][/color]
author: Census
